name: Turn Tile
description:
Turn Tile is a tile-matching puzzle game.

Set your high score and try to beat it!

*** How to Play ***
•Move rows and columns to match-up 3 or more of the same symbols.

•Be quick! Matching rows and columns consecutively will increase your combo multiplier.

•The more tiles in one match, the more points you'll receive.

•Click tiles to flip them over. Every tile has 2 sides and therefore, 2 symbols.

•Matching tiles will receive 2 new symbols so you'll have to pay attention!

•When no matches are to be found, right click or use the large button at the bottom to flip all the tiles!

•Have fun!
